name: fuckyoufriday
text: A comment left by fuckyoufriday was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ShemmJacc, NeoNaoNeo, NDCaesar, Audhumla)

name: mortshire
text: i know, teodor is making such a ruckus, as if he just got laid or scored some [illegal narcotics], when in reality he just got told off by a five-year-old.

name: zefiel
text: I always thought Téodor was shrugging off Cornelius or another authority figure telling him off for watching gay porn near Philippe, but I think what you say makes more sense.

name: zem
text: I figured Onstad himself gave him a talking-to. I mean they all still live in the same house right

name: catachresis
text:
This is what I thought. Onstad would bitch him out for letting Philippe watch gay porn, because he thinks Teodor will do the same thing for The Baby and scar the baby for life.

What Onstad doesn't realise is that exposure to gay porn early on in life actually decreases the truancy rate in children.

name: kledermans
text: Hva faen?

name: buttermoths
text: Visst faen.

name: gumfish
text: Men i helsike da. Hva i faen driver dere med her?

name: buttermoths
text: Tja. Jeg vil tørre å påstå at vi leser Achewood. Og jeg tviler forøvrig sterkt på at Assetbar vil gjenkjenne å, ø og æ...

name: aperson
text: [IMGS OFF]

name: mrtatulas
text: This made me spit my drink all over my keyboard. And I wasn't even drinking anything at the time!

text: 1. I salute you, aperson.

name: aperson
text: Thankyou tellumo - I appreciate that.

name: liamc
text: This is probably my favorite comment ever.

name: selbencoirlo
text:
This comment is inspired. I want to be just like you someday John Goodman.

First I must find out where the toes are kept.

name: razorman57
text: i dont get it.

name: dougthehead
text: Are you 'avin a laugh?  Is she 'avin a laugh?

name: evilbobikus
text: I just love the Ray/Beef conversations in which T is just looking back and forth, never really sure when to get into the conversation himself.

name: riotdejaneiro
text:
"Whoah! Why are you sitting around watching gay porn?"
"No, Teodor, this is actually the new Superman movie. ItŽs the scene where heŽs taking a shower in the police department."

name: william
text: How long would the real Andy Kaufman have gay sex for before revealing it was a joke?

name: patware
text: It would be about a month. Possibly longer.

name: saru
text:
He'd probably reveal that no, he really did love his wife, and enjoyed fathering his children with her... in his will... in a clause to be read on the tenth anniversary of his death.
And then, on the twentieth anniversary, he'd have another clause to be read, saying, "just kidding!"

name: nigelchaos
text: Post-mortem dedication to a joke is where it's at.

name: robertbevandalton
text: andy kaufman would have sex for a good forty minutes before molting and moving to guam.

name: boredom_man
text: Or possibly removing his Andy Kaufman suit to reveal Gilda Radner. The man was good.

name: nutmeg
text: so weird as i was reading this strip Man On the Moon came on the internet radio (shout out louds cover)

text: A comment left by retardo was marked as spam and excluded. retardo: What a douche. (reported by Horace_Lung, equinn2006, Patware)

text: OH YEAH!

text: Yeah, I'm sure it was.

name: deancain29
text: i'm pretty sure 90% of my comments are marked lame. *sad trombone*

name: fineoakstructure
text: Don't let 'em get you down, Dean!

name: clever-nickname
text: I love how Teodor is just watching Beef's and Ray's conversation.

name: phy
text: Those first three are some of my favourite panels in a comic strip ever. Saying something in a singsong voice and rocking from one side to the other, in the middle of otherwise nominal conversation; I highly recommend it.

name: saint
text: what would happen if the kool-aid man burst in through the wall to see two naked men?

name: pierceg
text: OH, YEAAHH!

name: fineoakstructure
text: This sounds like the kind of question that gets asked about 10 times a day in the Family Guy writers' room.

name: hooves
text: OHHHH YE...oh, I uh, I beg your pardon. say, you guys look thirsty!

name: ham_shoes
text: Softoffs. Softoffs would happen.

name: luckypyjamas
text: i have trouble reading teodor's expression in panels 3 and 4

name: luckypyjamas
text: by which i mean two and three

name: invidious
text: "3 and 4" is the new "two and three."

name: fineoakstructure
text: 10's and 20's

name: kickstart
text: we need a techno song where it samples someone saying T's "Yelled aaaaat" line over the beats

name: xiaomimi
text: I support this plan!  C'mon, music people!

text:
next time i'm armed with Garage Band, it is on like Diddy Kong.

name: adonkon
text: This has to be one of the top ten alt texts

name: shutup_shutup
text: Ray's last line brings up the question of whether or not Beef and Teodor already knew about the case disguises thing, or whether this remark caused them to say/think "What the hell is Ray talking about?"
